name: Spring is Coming
description:
Team: Donut Works

Members:
- Helcio Laurentino do Carmo Junior
- Rodrigo Masaaki Gonçalves Ono
- Yasmin Fernandes do Carmo

Synopsis: After a severe Winter, Spring, find herself very busy, and now she will make you her slave! I mean… An employee! Work for Spring herself, melt ice blocks in more creative ways and get ready for unusual encounters.  “Spring is coming” is a puzzle game, full of humor and references.

External Assets used:

- Highlight Material from First Person Story adventure;
- Fire particle from Polygon;
All audios are from:
- Ultimate Sound FX;
- John Leonard French - Game Audio Sample Pack;
- Iainmccurdy from freesound.
